%  Patch that allows `mathrel` tokens to be used as superscripts.
% SEE: https://tex.stackexchange.com/a/715288
% chktex-file 23

\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{superscript-patch}

\NewDocumentCommand\mesh{}{\mathrel{\#}}
\NewDocumentCommand\smallplus{}{\mathbin{\texttt{+}}}
\NewDocumentCommand\indep{}{\mathrel{\perp\!\!\!\perp}}
\NewDocumentCommand\myrel{}{\mathrel{\overset{\textsf{a.e.}}{\sim}}}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{l}
	$A \square B$   \\
	$A^\square$     \\
	$A^{\square}$   \\
	$A'^\square$    \\
	$A'^{\square}$  \\
	$A''^\square$   \\
	$A''^{\square}$ \\
	$A'''^\square$   \\
	$A'''^{\square}$ \\
\end{tabular}

% no prime
\begin{tabular}{lllllll}
$A \square B   $ &  $A^\square   $ & $A^{\square}   $ \\
$A \mesh B     $ &  $A^\mesh     $ & $A^{\mesh}     $ \\
$A \smallplus B$ &  $A^\smallplus$ & $A^{\smallplus}$ \\
$A \indep B    $ &  $A^\indep    $ & $A^{\indep}    $ \\
$A \myrel B    $ &  $A^\myrel    $ & $A^{\myrel}    $ \\
\end{tabular}

% single prime
\begin{tabular}{lllllll}
$A'^\square   $ & $A'^{\square}   $ \\
$A'^\mesh     $ & $A'^{\mesh}     $ \\
$A'^\smallplus$ & $A'^{\smallplus}$ \\
$A'^\indep    $ & $A'^{\indep}    $ \\
$A'^\myrel    $ & $A'^{\myrel}    $ \\
\end{tabular}

% double prime
\begin{tabular}{ll}
$A''^\square   $ & $A''^{\square}   $ \\
$A''^\mesh     $ & $A''^{\mesh}     $ \\
$A''^\smallplus$ & $A''^{\smallplus}$ \\
$A''^\indep    $ & $A''^{\indep}    $ \\
$A''^\myrel    $ & $A''^{\myrel}    $ \\
\end{tabular}

% triple prime
\begin{tabular}{ll}
$A'''^\square   $ & $A'''^{\square}   $ \\
$A'''^\mesh     $ & $A'''^{\mesh}     $ \\
$A'''^\smallplus$ & $A'''^{\smallplus}$ \\
$A'''^\indep    $ & $A'''^{\indep}    $ \\
$A'''^\myrel    $ & $A'''^{\myrel}    $ \\
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
